name: Kyle Brinkmann
text: Food was ok, but be careful when not ordering online it is expensive. You can get way better pizza for your money Waterloo from other places for the same price if you call in and order over the phone.

name: KeViN & BeThAnY Morgan
text: Awesome!

name: Grantimas maximas
text: Fast reliable service. Pizzas are always made well.

name: Alice Breidegam
text: Chicken Alfredo delivered tonight.   Could only tolerate about 3 bites.   Nothing but salt and pasta.   Good bye Pizza Hut.  Never again.

name: Bethany Morgan
text: Yummy yummy

name: Rachael Buffa
text: Was good service and very fast. Had the buffet and asked for cheese pizza and they made it without hesitation. Came and told us when it was out so we could get it so our kids could eat too.

name: Kenneth Stout
text: Got a carryout order. Staff was friendly. Food was hot and ready when promised. And had good taste.

name: Richard Hinojosa
text: Just got our pizzas from pizza hut and they forgot the 2 liter and the pizza cheese was stuck to the top of the box

name: Kathryn Wehking
text: Good food and curtious service.

name: Jackie A
text: Just ordered from Waterloo IL Pizza Hut.....speedy contactless delivery and the food was still piping hot and delicious.

name: 2nd Draft Music
text: Great food, great service! But the pizza buffet is terrible. They have only 2 pizzas per hour (and they have to be shared by everyone there) and they have like pineapple sausage or something. Again, the food is great, but don't get the buffet it's not worth it.

name: Jamie Kempfer
text: A bit of a slower pace then most stops.However it's not a fast food joint so enjoy it.

name: Dixie Gay
text: Not so great pizza barely warm

name: Tom Bauer
text: The wings were great and were the breadsticks.  Service was very good.

name: Jeri Ormesher
text: Quick and easy, they always take great care of our needs!

name: James McGhee
text: Great customer service, consistently good food!

name: Wesley Carson
text: Pretty nifty stuff, good pizza and great service

name: Shaun Clements
text: I feel like they work hard to get the food prepared and out the door as quickly and accurately as possible. Personally, I have been informed when there was an issue with my order and that was much appreciated! This Pizza Hut is closest to my home, but I would still order from here regardless.

name: bob lunk
text: Marie was great. Patient with us with not knowing what we wanted. Telling us the best deals to get.

name: Evan Crane
text: Great personal pans.

name: Rod Haynes
text: Awesome if you like half cook pizza

name: Derrick Hardin
text: The older woman who seated us and took our order, was pretty mean and tried  to rush us

name: Pam Loos
text: Friendly, fast and serves great pizza. My family loves Pizza Hut in Waterloo,  Illinois.

name: Corey Webb
text: Nice place with good service. Buffet doesn't have much on it, but kids eat free so who's complaining? If you like Pizza Hut, this is a good one.

name: Bryana Spalding
text: Only there goods and pasta

name: Pamela LaBrot
text: Great brownies but greasy pizza

name: welborn 11
text: Lunch time buffet no pizza on buffet no salad bar. When I asked about salad bar server said they don't have one never mentioned they can make it in the back and bring it to you. When they did bring a couple of pizzas out the line was so long by the time you got to the pizzas they was all gone. Lunch time .... Not cool

name: Karen Krump
text: Very poor management and service. Not worth one star.

name: Brian Olsen Sr
text: About what you would expect from a typical fast food pizza place.

name: Will T
text: Great buffet. Could use more salad options but for the price it's a great lunch

name: Janelle Warnecke
text: Restaurant was cold.  Service was terrible and food took forever.   It wasn't crowded...maybe 3 tables if that.  Had to ask for someone to take our money at the cash register....everyone was chit chatting behind the counter and we had to interrupt them in order to pay....after waiting at our table, then at the register.

name: Andy Maag
text: It's really great that they have a drive through window for pick up, and really unfortunate that they don't prioritize it. On their busy nights, you should get in the drive thru line before submitting your order. Don't expect anything less than a 15 minute wait unless you're the only car in line.

name: lori jacobs-demick
text: Great food and great people

name: Austin Foutch
text: Some stuff that's on the menu they don't have. Need to fix this.

name: W.charles Tate
text: Ate at what laughingly was described as a buffet. All the food was cold. For the price I paid, I would have rather ate a cold stale baloney sandwich!!! And ignore the one star I had to give it that so I could post my displeasure.

name: PAT GRONEMAN
text: Not bad and very friendly

name: Jordan Burdg
text: I really enjoy Pizza Hut pizza but this location cannot get a order right.

name: john smith
text: we decided to stop at the Waterloo Illinois Pizza Hut  while out shopping...and now we wish we didn't. We haven't been in there since they changed location so we thought we would have a nice sit down...and that is all we got. First...why is â€¦More

name: douglas clements
text: I normally like Pizza Hut, but after two times at the one in Waterloo IL, not again. It appears the owners of this Pizza Hut are trying to make their profits by skimping on their quality. Little to no sauce, small amount of the extra toppings I always order and way too much money for what I got. Never again.

name: Clara Mae Hoguet
text: Very good fast service

name: Nick Schilling
text: Friendly staff and good food

name: Roger Maus
text: Great...love their pizza

name: Lynn & Nancy Wellman
text: Food was great. Overpriced for what you get.

name: John Roland
text: Marie in waterloo Illinios was a great waitress

name: chris shadowens
text: Excellent service.

name: Bruce
text: Pitiful. Slow service. Order the wings and they were awful. Would not suggest going here.

name: Jeff Drummond
text: Ove the drive up option to get my pie.

name: REBECCA BREWER
text: Pizza had a lot of sauce.  Way more than usual.

name: Rick Jones
text: Good hot pizzas and ice cold refreshments!

name: Tsui Lee
text: nice services and clean

name: imthatpeep100 pets
text: It's Pizza Hut. Service at this place is usually good (although I feel wasteful when they give me an extra water when I'm only halfway through my first one).

name: Shelia K
text: This place is a joke. Ran by a bunch of out to lunch teenagers that have no business without a supervisor or manager. We litterly had to wait hours to eat cause they forgot to look at the clock. They told us that they didn't know it was time to bake pizza. Smh

name: Angie Hoernis
text: No buffet for lunch on a Sat. Took 35 minutes to get our salads and the waitress only had 4 tables with less than 4 people at each one. Very poor poor service!

name: James Zahn
text: Over an hour for bread sticks. With one other table in the restaurant.

name: Josh Nurnberger
text: Nicest pizza hut I've ever been to

name: Don Bray
text: Pizza was made right

name: Dan Markle
text: Stopped off there for lunch for their Pizza Buffet not much variety the fountain Pepsi was really good the pasta noodles with the Alfredo sauce was good the pizza was somewhat Bland

name: Sam Morgan
text: Good service

name: Josh Doerr
text: Great

name: eric Jones
text: Fast service, polite

name: Ryan Murphy
text: Slums

name: Gary Popp
text: It was terrible. Sodas we're flat, little ice. Long wait for service

name: Tim Mclean
text: Its pizza

name: james crowe
text: Not too good.

name: Travis Loughary
text: Service sucked in waterloo

name: Jody Worley
text: Never enough waitresses. Can't seem to keep up with the pizzas during the buffet. It's just "okay".

name: Jill Lannert
text: Not enough staff and it took forever to dine in.

name: Jessica Hodge
text: Great service

name: Rachel Kahle
text: Horrible we had to wait for plates to eat the buffet and even after that they didn't have much pizza up there.

name: Keith Norman
text: Great lunch buffet, waitress was great

name: Littlefart 2000
text: Amazing

name: Nancy Durell-Koch
text: Love Pizza Hut!

name: Jerri Laubenthal
text: Love to eat there.

name: Jill G
text: Who doesn't love Pizza Hut?

name: Kathleen Phillips
text: Tonight we were told by Ben, the manager that he wouldn't be delivering our dinner. WTG and lose a customer, Ben.
